ad_text: Integrity Quality Construction Sponsored Integrity Quality Construction is looking for a reliable driver to join our team! We require: - A Valid Driver's license - Clean driving record - Must be able to lift up to 50 pounds - Schedule is Monday - Friday and some Saturdays - Comfortable driving a pickup truck hauling crews, material and trailers - No CDL needed If you love driving or if you are a retired person looking for some extra income this is a great opportunity with a growing company! Call us today for an immediate interview! 260-909-0246 Driver Position Available Call Now
